members.name: create
members.description: If this property is true, and the requested file or directory doesn't exist, the user agent should create it. The default is false. The parent directory must already exist.

members.name: exclusive
members.description: If true, and the create option is also true, the file must not exist prior to issuing the call. Instead, it must be possible for it to be created newly at call time. The default is false.
